content: This PR by @Eric Wieser replaces Matrix multiplication ⬝ with usual (heterogeneous) multiplication *. It touches 74 files, so I think it would be best not to leave it lying around too long. I've marked all changes which are more than a simple ⬝ → * with a comment, which should make it fairly easy to review and merge
One question that remains (possibly for a follow-up) is whether it makes sense to write a custom elaborator or unification hint to fix the regressions
